title: got five leaverbusters for disconnecting and reconnecting
body: So i disconnected during the loading screen and had to restart my computer and when i got back and sighed in they already remade so i got 5 leaverbusters for nothing please help with this problem.

replies.body: Anytime you notice something going wrong with your pc, like disconnections or crashes, it's probably a good idea to take a step back and try to troubleshoot what's going wrong before queueing back up and taking the risk of having another dc. Let's take a moment now to look over your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for anything that looks a little out of place and might be blocking your connection from our servers.
